articles.description: Do a dance to the "Jeopardy!" Think Music. The best return for the Tournament of Champions, including Amy Schneider, Matt Amodio and Mattea Roach.
articles.content:
Do a little dance to the "Jeopardy!" Think Music: Some of the quiz show's greatest players are back!

articles.title: Julie Andrews reflects on 'Sound of Music' with new children's book: 'It was a happy film to make' - USA TODAY
articles.description: Julie Andrews' new children's book "The First Notes" has ties to "The Sound of Music," exploring some of the real history behind the musical scale.
articles.content:
Julie Andrews knows how important it is to start at the very beginning.
